text: Kouakou Henry-Joane Aaron Aimerick Gadou (born 17 January 2007 in Aubervilliers) is a French football player. ==Career == Gadou started his career at ES Nangissienne. For the 2020/21 season, he joined the Paris Saint- Germain youth team. In January 2024, he made his first appearance in the first squad. He made never a single appearance. In September 2024, Gadou moved to Austrian Bundesliga club FC Red Bull Salzburg. Red Bull Salzburg He made his Bundesliga debut that same month. He came as a substitute for Kamil PiÄ…tkowski in stoppage time on matchday eight of the 2024/25 season against FK Austria Wien. He made also 9 apperances for the FC Salzburg U19 in the UEFA Youth League. ==International == Gadou made his first appearance for the French youth national team in 2022. In 2023, he participated with U-17 team at the European Championship. He played in three matches during the tournament. France finished second. In 2024, he participated again in the U-17 European Championshi. There he was captain of the team. France was eliminated in the group stage. ==References== Category:2007 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players Category:FC Liefering players
title: Joane Gadou
